replies.author: 乙烯_中国
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 乙烯_中国 于 2019-11-8 22:14 编辑 

This is a community-driven project to bridge the linguistic gap between English and Chinese community. The goal of this project is to offer accurate and updated translations for the official blogs on Minecraft.net. We strive to bring the best translations available for the forum and to a broader extent, the Chinese community, to spread the culture of the international Minecraft community. This is a continuous effort and we're grateful for every contribution from all the translators so far, but your help can make the difference too. If you want to contribute, before starting, please check the board stickies to learn more about the rules and guidelines.

这是一个由社区自发组织的缩短英文与中文社区语言鸿沟的项目。本项目的目标在于带来准确及时的Minecraft.net博文翻译。我们致力于为论坛，以及中文社区带来最好的译文，传播国际Minecraft社区文化。这个项目需要长久的努力，我们诚挚感谢至目前为止所有翻译者做出的贡献，但你的加入也能让这个项目变得更好。如果你也想为此做出贡献，请在开始之前查阅置顶已了解版规与准则。
